item.title: Skills
item.description: Here&s what I&ve been learning or working with recently: Languages Python ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ JavaScript ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ Ruby ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ Frameworks Flask ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ Django ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ReactJS/React Native ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ Ruby On Rails ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ Other Skills Git ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ Linux ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ SQL ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ AWS ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ Docker ⭐ ⭐ ⭐

item.title: About me
item.description: Hello, my name is Julia Rizza and I’ve been coding since I was 14. It was a very fun hobbie at the time, and I ended up making it my profession. Today I work with backend development of web APIs, cloud applications and microservices. Also, I like to share knowledge and mentor others. In the past, I've build up courses around Python and various of its frameworks. I find that you can always learn something by teaching others.
